doc.title: Knocked Out, Tied Up 1
doc.plot: Three hot girls, Katie, Kelly Simon and Nina Neon, are victims of white slavers. Each girl is chloroformed twice, including while tied! Katie is knocked out and bound and gagged in a sexy stretchy dress. Later, she wakes up in sexy white undies, tape-gagged. Kelly is chlorfed in pretty dress, hose, heels. She awakens in bondage. Knocked out again, she awakens fully nude and bound to a chair. The villain gags her on camera. Beautiful Nina is K.O.d at an office in mini-skirt, heels. Bound and gagged, she hops to the phone. Then, shes tied and tape-gagged in hot spandex. Her top is removed to reveal luscious breasts.
